txt.en: Herefara is in Brockbridge.\n\nHerefara would like to thank you for your aid in the battle.

'We have stood toe-to-toe with the enemy for some time and have managed to force this stalemate. They are receiving supplies and reinforcements, and it seems they are setting the stage for an assault. I fear that when the hammer comes down, we will not have the men or supplies to withstand it.\n\n'War drums can be heard in the distance. My worst fears are coming true, and they march on us in force. Please aid our defence!'
'The sound of the drums has grown louder, and the enemy cannot be far from us now. We must be ready!'
The stalemate in Brockbridge was only temporary, as the enemy is marching to assault the city, and war drums can be heard in the distance to announce their approach.

'[placeholder], you have my thanks. We could not have survived the attack, nor suffered so few losses without your help. You are an accomplished [placeholder], and you have proved your mettle. I would have you fight by my side any day.'
Talk to Herefara to aid the defence of Brockbridge.
